item.title: [AutoTalker] My first ever script thanks to Un-Named
item.dc:creator: @Gully Gully
item.description:
@Gully wrote:

Hi, Un-named introduced me to Scar script writing, and i found it very interesting, with help from Un-named i finally managed to write my first ever script. Here it is:

[code]//---------------------------------------------------------//
//My First Script! - this script was made by Gully and help//
//from the Un-named of moparisthebest //
//Instructions: //
//1) modify message 1 to what message you would like //
//2) start the script //
//3) press F3 to start autotalking //
//4) Press F3 to stpo autotalking //
//---------------------------------------------------------//

program Gully_autotalker;

const
Message1=‘first eva - edit this message’;

procedure hello;
begin
SendKeys(Message1 + Chr(13));
end;

begin
repeat
until IsFKeydown(3);
repeat
hello;
until IsFKeyDown(3);
end.[/code]

Thanks Un-named

…Gully

Read full topic
item.source: [AutoTalker] My first ever script thanks to Un-Named
